titleStmt.title: Severall chirurgicall treatises by Richard Wiseman ...
titleStmt.author: Wiseman, Richard, 1622?-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Flesher and J. Macock, for R. Royston ... and B. Tonk ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Tables of contents: p. [13]-[14], and [2]-[14] at end.

A treatise of tumours -- A treatise of ulcers -- A treatise of the diseases of the anus -- A treatise of the king's-evill -- A treatise of wounds -- A treatise of gun-shot wounds -- A treatise of fractures and luxations -- Of Leus Venerea.
